title: Forms
cleaned_text: Download the form you need [Allergy Health Plan (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/-%20Allergy%20Anaphylaxis%20Health%20Care%20Plan.pdf) [Authorization and Consent/Child Release Form (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/MIT-media-release-form.pdf) [Neighborhood Walk Permission Slip (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/Neighborhood%20Field%20Trip%20Permission%20Form.pdf) [Parent/Guardian Photo and Video Notice and Acknowledgment (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/Parent%20Guardian%20Photo%20and%20Videio%20Notice%20and%20Acknowledgment.pdf) Applications Administration (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/BH%20-%20Topical%20Applications%20Administration%20-%20Permission.pdf) [Transportation Plan (PDF)](/sites/default/files/documents/transportation-plan-authorization.pdf) At the time of enrollment, families will also be required to provide the following documentation: - Proof of physical/well child visit - Proof of immunizations - Proof of flu shot - Proof of lead test at ages 1, 2, and 3 years of age
